channel.title: CVE Feed for Zoom Communications, Inc -- Zoom Workplace Desktop App for Windows
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Zoom Communications, Inc -- Zoom Workplace Desktop App for Windows

item.title: CVE-2024-39827|2024-07-15T17:25:49.312Z -- zoom%20communications%2C%20inc -- zoom%20workplace%20desktop%20app%20for%20windows
item.description: Improper input validation in the installer for Zoom Workplace Desktop App for Windows before version 6.0.10 may allow an authenticated user to conduct a denial of service via local access.
